name: MANNA
briefDescription: MANNA is a developmental disability centre providing holistic development to children from lower income groups with special needs in Bangalore in the state of Karnataka for the past 8 years. MANNA focuses on children with development disorders like Autism, Learning Disorders, Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) and Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD),Cerebral Palsy and Down's Syndrome.
